attributes.action: Designate Britain First as a terrorist organisation.
attributes.additional_details: Terrorism: the use or threat of serious violence against a person; involves serious damage to property; endangers a person’s life; creates a serious risk to the health or safety of the public or section of the public. The use or threat of such action must be designed to influence the government or an international governmental organisation or to intimidate the public or a section of the public and be undertaken for the purpose of advancing a political, religious, racial or ideological cause
attributes.background:
Britain First is a 'political party' which openly incites hatred to immigrants and religions other than Christianity. 

They call to take the country back from the traitors by hanging them and carry out Christian Patrols. 

Members have been convicted of aggravated harassment. 

Stop the hate
